mapper.sql: sort AS "sort",state AS "state", coding_rules_id AS "codingRulesId", coding_rules_classification_id AS "codingRulesClassificationId", name AS "name", coding_rules AS "codingRules", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_coding_rules where 1 = 1
and coding_rules_classification_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.codingRulesClassificationId},'%')
and name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.name},'%')
and coding_rules like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.codingRules},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
